metaData.label: BE-NL
metaData.criteriaDescription: language equal nl-BE AND ( brick2 is not equal UG1.WBE.01000 OR brick2 is null  )

metaData.label: BE-EN
metaData.criteriaDescription: language equal en AND ( brick2 is not equal UG1.WBE.01000 OR brick2 is null  )
